name: Deploy to Vercel
description: Deploy web apps to Vercel. Defaults to production (publicly accessible). Use --preview for protected preview deployments.
author: Prompt Stack

inputs.name: project_path
inputs.description: Path to the project to deploy

inputs.name: preview
inputs.description: Deploy as preview (requires authentication to view). Default: false (deploys to production)

outputs.name: url
outputs.description: Deployed URL (public production URL by default)

secrets.label: Vercel API Token
secrets.description: Personal access token for deploying to Vercel
